input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

ref_genomes_list.description: Path to TSV list of reference genomes to download, first column is the name of the genome and second column is the accession.

samples_list.description: Path to TSV list of sample accessions to download, first column is the name of the sample, second column is the SRA accession.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.
